roleset.name: manner of motion
roleset.note: PRANCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prance' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion. (from prance.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Here she delivers, especially during her enthusiastically awful rendition of the ``Candy Man,'' which she-21 sings while [*-21] prancing around in a little cotton candy pink angora sweater that couldn't be more perfect.
example.arg: in a little cotton candy pink angora sweater that couldn't be more perfect
